name: OCKReadablePatientStore
desc: A read-only store that fetches patient data objects.

items.name: func fetchPatient(withID: String, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Patient>)
items.desc: Fetches a patient asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchPatients(query: Self.PatientQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Patient]>)
items.desc: Fetches an array of patients asynchronously from the store.
